Title: Silverlight South Park Animation
Description:
This is a prototype application I'm working on for my daughter, which uses some of the South Park characters being animated; this is being built in Expression Designer and Blend. 

All graphics are built in Designer and exported as XAML then converted into user controls in Blend.
